name: 2PLAY
description: A playlist making app for you and your copilot, powered by Spotify, and built using mySQL, Handlebars, jQuery, Express, and Node.js.

name: Juniper's Weather
description: Get your weather information from a child in a web application featuring drawings by Juniper. Built with the AllWeather API and jQuery, and utilizing Local Storage.

name: Code Quiz
description: Test your coding knowledge with this quick coding quiz covering elements from HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. Check your high score on the leaderboard.

name: JavaScript Hangman
description: Welcome to the wild wild west, where justice is decided by a bizarre game of hangman from the future.  Criterion Films make up over 200 puzzles in this hangman depiction using HTML and pure javaScript

name: Bob's Burgers Burger Eater
description: Bob's Burgers comes to life in this playful app where you can devour, regurgitate, and create your own Burger Specials. This application was an exercise using Handlebars and mySQL.

name: Dayplanner
description: Keep track of your daily appointments in style, utilizing local storage in your browser.

name: FFXIV Mounts
description: Browse, sort, and view your favorite FFXIV Mounts in this simple React application, click on any mount to obtain more information through ffxivcollect.com

name: Fitness Tracker
description: Workout logging is hard, but not with this app utilizing mongoDB and Mongoose to store, retrieve, and compile results. Weekly charts creatively display your results and help you analyze your next move.

name: Offline Budget Tracker
description: No need to sweat your budget when travelling, this handy app works on or offline using service workers, indexedDB, and caching to provide peace of mind.

name: Coming Out of Quarantine
description: Need a drink coming out of quarantine? Using jQuery, this app will lead you to the nearest watering hole or taco truck with the MapBox and Zomato API's.

name: Study Check
description: Every school needs a central hub of communication where information can reliably be delivered. Study Check is a full MERN application that solves this issue for everyone.

name: Your Personal Bookshelf
description: Create your own bookshelf of titles you want to keep track of, or create an orderly backlist of titles to read. This MERN application will do the organization, all you have to do is search and add.

name: The Threadery
description: Having trouble keeping track of your threads and yarns?  Manage a dynamic inventory, explore color and thread options, and create a shopping list with The Threadery MERN stack thread tracker.

name: Learning Portal
alt: Coding logos for html, css, javascript, and react
description: With this MERN stack application, test your coding knowledge with multiple choice coding quizes, and engage in discussion on Learning Portal's message boards.
